item.title: @elonmusk: VP JD Vance in Minneapolis: ‚ÄúWe're not trying to send a political message. We're trying to enforce t...
item.description: VP JD Vance in Minneapolis: ‚ÄúWe're not trying to send a political message. We're trying to enforce the law.‚Äù

item.title: @elonmusk: ELON MUSK: "In the future, the robots will make so many robots, that they will actually saturate all...
item.description: ELON MUSK: "In the future, the robots will make so many robots, that they will actually saturate all human needs, meaning you won't be able to even think of something to ask the robot for at a certain point, like there will be such an abundance of goods and services. There'll be more robots than people. I think everyone on earth is going to have one humanoid robot because you would want a robot to watch over your kids, take care of your pet, take care of elderly parents. I'm very optimistic about the future. I think we're headed for a future of amazing abundance, which is very cool. Definitely we are in the most interesting time in history."

item.title: @elonmusk: Most people don't understand what Elon is saying about AI and robotics: 1. real GDP is a direct func...
item.description: Most people don't understand what Elon is saying about AI and robotics: 1. real GDP is a direct function of the volume of goods and services and their cost 2. humanoid hyper-intelligent robots can make every need go asymptotically to $0 3. ubiquitous abundance and high income are a very real possibility Obviously, there's a jagged front in this wave of progress, but it'll accelerate at an insane speed And, as long as the AI can't lie and the robots can't hurt humans, it will be an incredible future

item.title: @elonmusk: True, install a@TeslaPowerwall to have uninterrupted power for your house. When your utility goes do...
item.description: True, install a@TeslaPowerwall to have uninterrupted power for your house. When your utility goes down, you will be one of the few in your neighborhood with working lights, working refrigerator and able to charge all your devices.
